title: I had a question about the reward for reaching lvl 5 honor for next season
body:
So it said were gurantee a Medieval Twitch or Gray Warwick

But if we already own these skins then what now?

replies.body: If you already have both of those then your rank 5 capsule is supposed to give you 5 key fragments and then a random emote or ward skin too.
can u answer the question above?

Perhaps I misunderstood ya; you asked "what now" if you already own the skins. I assumed that you were asking what you got from the capsules instead of those skins if you already had em (which is random a ward skin/emote as shown in the FAQ below as well). 

Did you mean something else?


https://i.gyazo.com/07e93a08950affca3448ba96bc02fcf5.png
ty for your support , I appreciate it

ik but it not fair cause other ppl without it gets it.

While i have it get nothing?shouldn't i get another reward that replace 1 of the 2 skins that i already own?
